workexperiences.name: Edfora Infotech Pvt Ltd.
workexperiences.description1: Working as a Frontend developer on the product of the company, i.e. myPAT having technology stack based on Angular.

workexperiences.name: iB Hubs
workexperiences.description1: Worked as a Frontend developer on ReactJS. Initially, joined as a Backend developer and worked on Django.

workexperiences.name: OpenSense Labs
workexperiences.description1: Worked as a Software Developer Intern (Module Developer) for the open-source organization and developed CleanTaxonomy module (used to manage keywords) and Attendance module using Drupal8.

communityexperiences.name: Women Techmakers, Jalandhar
communityexperiences.description1: Planned and organized events for female developers and providing a platform to uplift them in the technical world, on behalf of WTM Jalandhar.
communityexperiences.description2: Organized and volunteered the events, specially for female developers and promoted diversity in the community and technical field.

communityexperiences.name: Google Developers Group, Jalandhar
communityexperiences.description1: Organized various events all over Punjab on behalf of GDG Jalandhar and delivered technical sessions on Actions on Google, Dialogflow, Firebase, PWA and Web Fundamentals. Also, contributed in projects/web apps of GDG Jalandhar for the upcoming events.
communityexperiences.description2: Volunteered in multiple events and planned the meetups of behlf of GDG Jalandhar.
